long_description: Expand your travel options with the convertible Eagle Creek 2-in-1 Waistpack & Shoulder Bag. The simple webbing strap adjusts to wear around your waist or over your shoulder. This innovative, ultralight bag is made from highly durable and water-resistant silnylon (nylon impregnated with silicone). Bottom section unzips to expand bag's capacity from 3.25 liters to 5 liters. Lockable main compartment has finger-friendly zipper pulls. Front zippered pocket keeps items handy. Eagle Creek 2-in-1 Waistpack & Shoulder Bag has reflective accents for low-light visibility. Included carry/storage pouch can double as an internal security pocket. Waistpack (unexpanded) dimensions: 9 x 6.25 x 3 in.; shoulder bag (expanded) dimensions: 10 x 9 x 3 in. Washable.
short_description: Expand your travel options with the convertible Eagle Creek 2-in-1 Waistpack & Shoulder Bag. The simple webbing strap adjusts to wear around your waist or over your shoulder.
